# vyos_container_registry (Resource)

<div style="text-align: center">
Container applications

<br>
&darr;
<br>
<b>
Registry Name
</b>

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `registry_id` (String) Registry Name

### Optional

- `authentication` (Attributes) Authentication settings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--authentication))
- `disable` (Boolean) Disable instance

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource ID, an amalgamation of the `registry_id` and the parents `*_id` fields seperated by dunder `__` starting with top level ancestor.

<a id="nestedatt--authentication"></a>
### Nested Schema for `authentication`

Optional:

- `password` (String) Password used for authentication

    |  Format &emsp; | Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  txt  &emsp; |  Password  |
- `username` (String) Username used for authentication

    |  Format &emsp; | Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  txt  &emsp; |  Username  |
